MathExpression.Script: choose('Vehicle Acceleration Longitudinal' [G] < 0.5 AND ( 'Brake Pressure Front' [psi] + 'Brake Pressure Rear' [bar] ) >= 10, abs('Vehicle Acceleration Longitudinal' [G] / ( 'Brake Pressure Front' [bar] + 'Brake Pressure Rear' [bar] )), invalid()) * 100
sqrt(( sqr('Vehicle Acceleration Longitudinal' [G]) + sqr('Vehicle Acceleration Lateral' [G]) ))
choose(( 'Brake Pressure Front' [psi] <= 5 AND 'Brake Pressure Rear' [psi] <= 5 ) OR 'Throttle Pedal' [%] <= 10, 1, invalid())
choose(( 'Brake Pressure Front' [psi] >= 5 AND 'Brake Pressure Rear' [psi] >= 5 ) OR 'Throttle Pedal' [%] >= 10, 1, invalid())
integrate(abs('Steering Angle' [deg]), 'Corr Speed' [km/h] >= 5 AND 'Engine Speed' [rpm] >= 3000, range_change("Outings:Laps"))
